title: Intel Extreme Masters to return to Brazil in 2023
description: CS:GO will head to Brazil as a part of ESL's Pro Tour calendar in 2023.

title: [LIVE] Heroic vs. Outsiders: new Major champions to be crowned in Rio
description: Two teams have defied the odds and pre-tournament predictions to make the final. Who will emerge victorious?

title: mezii: "I think we're not even halfway there with the potential we have"
description: The fnatic pair of William "mezii" Merriman and Dion "FASHR" Derksen made an appearance on HLTV Confirmed to discuss a wide-range of topics, from their debuts at a Major to what comes next for the team.

title: [VOD] magixx joins HLTV Confirmed for final episode from Rio
description: The Spirit rifler will provide insight into the happenings at the IEM Rio Major.

title: stavn: "KSCERATO is a really sick player"
description: One series remains between Heroic and the IEM Rio Major trophy after the Danes took down hometown heroes FURIA in the semi-finals.

title: Heroic beat FURIA on home turf to make IEM Rio Major grand final
description: The Danish team advance to their first-ever Major final after overcoming the hometown favorites.

title: n0rb3r7 on reaching Rio final: "Nothing special; we just need to prove ourselves tomorrow"
description: Outsiders' Dastan "dastan" Akbayev and David "n0rb3r7" Danielyan spoke to HLTV saying pressure will be on the other team whether FURIA or Heroic join them in the grand final.

title: Outsiders defeat MOUZ to secure IEM Rio grand final berth
description: The Russians got the better of the European mix in a three-map series to advance to the grand final of the IEM Rio Major.

title: [VOD] HLTV Confirmed with FASHR and mezii: talking about fnatic and Major semis
description: The fnatic duo join the show at 16:00.

title: Elisa Masters Espoo schedule announced
description: The playoffs of the event will be held in the Espoo Metro Arena.
